title: Workshop on Integrated Design of H∞ Tracking Control and Model-Free Q-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of linear system control theory, understanding of discrete-time control concepts, and basic programming skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining smartphone-based VR simulations with offline workshops, emphasizing real-world industry case-based learning.

learning_goals: The mathematical structures of H∞ control theory and Q-learning algorithms can be explained without system modeling
A step-by-step process is designed to implement the GARE (Game Algebraic Riccati Equation) solution using Q-learning
Control systems are optimized in a simulation environment under sustained engagement (PE) conditions
Control strategies applicable to real industrial problems are developed by adapting the F-16 short-period dynamics case

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
